Articles.Content:
All right guys, the Neptune-III is only just off the horizon and i'm already here with the Neptune-IV! The Neptune-IV is not a complete rebuild, but it is most certainly an evolution of its predecessor. The Neptune-III had some aesthetical problems, but also some rather annoying problems. I am happy to report that most of these issues have been resolved. The lander got an all new, not crappy looking fairing, and the stage 3 engine got a fairing for the first time. Also the problem with controls on stage 3 has been resolved. The Neptune-IV still remains an apollo style moon rocket, and it can probably also reach Minmus. Do mind the rocket has a very high part count, 718 if i recall correct! So except a bit of lag if you're not using the newest computer

I hope you guys like it, if you do please say it in the comments, and Good Luck!!!

Earlier version of the Neptune:
